price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߸ ߟߏ߲ߓߊ ߘߏ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ߞߏ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
